name: Toddler Program (1.5 - 2.5 years)
description: Our toddler program provides your newly independent child a safe environment to explore, learn, build curiosity and make new friends, all at their own pace. Schedule Includes: - Morning Snack - Circle Time to start the day - Enrichment Program (Varies Daily) - Outdoor Play Time - Lunch - Nap - Afternoon Snack - Story Time/Literacy - Teacher Directed Small Group Activity/Outdoor Play Time rotation - Free exploration & play time

howToGetIt: They have a rolling enrollment system i.e. you can join any time of the year, if space is available. Please email them for tour information [valencia@creativegardenslearning.com]. After the tour, you may turn in an application to enroll. If there is no space, you may fill out a waiting list form, and we'll contact you as soon as a space becomes available.
